title: Hello, flat-file world
author: Jason Lamb
content_html:
Welcome to the blog that refuses to pay the database tax.

Each post is a .json file. The homepage reads posts/index.json and builds the list. Clicking a post loads posts/<slug>.json.

How to add a new post

  1. Copy posts/_template.json to posts/my-new-post.json
  2. Change the slug, title, dates, tags, and HTML
  3. Add the post entry to posts/index.json (or run the build script)

Thatâ€™s it. No admin panel. No plugins. No mysterious tables named wp_options doing eldritch things.
